Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: Hi, does this bug refer to 0.6?

Action.author: vineet.timble@oracle.com
Action.body: Yes this was raised for 0.6. haven't got chance to verify if same issue is present in 1.0.0 preview

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~ellaki Please verify that this is either specific to v0.6 or relevant for v1.0.0 and add affectedVersion accordingly. If v0.6 only, please mark fixVersion WON'T FIX and close it.
